original_text: “Go up to Hilkiah the high priest and have him get ready the money that has been brought into the temple of the Lord, which the doorkeepers have collected from the people.
korean_text: 너는 대제사장 힐기야에게 올라가서 백성이 여호와의 성전에 드린 은 곧 문 지킨 자가 수납한 은을 계산하여

sentences.original_text: Go up to Hilkiah the high priest
and have him get ready the money
that has been brought into the temple of the Lord
which the doorkeepers have collected from the people
